basics.name: Brandon Tabios
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a double major in Computer Science and German at the University of Hawaii. I am expected to graduate in Fall of 2024.

highlights: Learned how to prepare sushi in a quickly and eloquent fashion
Taught many time management skills, as I worked in highschool

work.summary: A private german tutor for highschool students
highlights: Taught a student different german skills, as well as organization, and study techniques
Coordinating with the German teacher, and the students parent to maximize what can be taught

awards.title: LLEA BA: German Studies ACHIEVEMENT AWARD RECIPIENT
awards.summary: German achievement award towards hard working students in the department. Also provided scholarship money as a recipient.

awards.title: LLEA BA: German Studies ACHIEVEMENT AWARD RECIPIENT
